Miriam Suzanne » Fonts

Font Configuration

Related

Accoutrement Type [external]

$body-font

scss 
$body-font: (
  'name': 'freight-text-pro',
  'stack':
    (
      'Baskerville',
      'Palatino',
      'Cambria',
      'Georgia',
      'serif'
    ),
  'source': 'https://typekit.com/fonts/freight-text',
);

Freight Text Pro is the primary font of the OddBird brand.

Font Preview freight-text-pro (body)

css 
font-family: freight-text-pro, Baskerville, Palatino, Cambria, Georgia, serif;

$amp

scss 
$amp: (
  'name': 'amp',
  'stack':
    (
      'freight-text-pro',
      'Baskerville',
      'Palatino',
      'Cambria',
      'Georgia',
      'serif'
    ),
  'italic':
    (
      'woff2':
